Text.Page: Have some time on your hands, <PCNAME>?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"As a matter of fact, I do."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

{@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} needs a hand. Poor thing only has two—as she keeps telling me. What I wouldn't give for a trained cephalopod.

Anyway, I'm sure she can put your idle hands to work.

Did {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} tell you I couldn't handle this on my own? She has some nerve. I'll show her what I'm made of, she'll see...

Sorry. I'm a little on edge today. I have a "friend" visiting from out of town.

All right, well go to it then.

Thanks, friend.

{@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} has a little something for your trouble.
Where’s the shetla fiber I asked you to get? This is making me look bad, you realize.

Ah, this is high quality rough hide. Nice work.

You know the drill. {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} holds the key to the treasury.
Did you get the rough hide? My hide will be rough if you don't get a move on.
Thanks, <PCNAME>! Taratia has you to thank for her continued employment.
